meanings.definition: A type of fried dough pastry typically dusted with powdered sugar.
meanings.sent1: At the fair, I enjoyed eating zeppoles with my friends.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought a dozen zeppoles from the bakery for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The zeppoles at the carnival were so delicious, I couldn't stop eating them!
meanings.sent4: The zeppoles were like little clouds of sweetness in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried zeppoles filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: Plural form of zeppole, an Italian pastry similar to a doughnut.
meanings.sent1: We shared a plate of zeppoles at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The zeppoles at the bakery were still warm and smelled amazing.
meanings.sent3: My brother accidentally ate all the zeppoles, thinking they were regular doughnuts!
meanings.sent4: The zeppoles were a sweet surprise in the midst of our dessert selection.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown zeppoles were a delightful treat after dinner.
